competitive_intel:
## Available Competitive Intelligence

- Competition description: `../research/description.md`
- 5 top kernel notebooks in `../research/kernels/`

data_findings.finding: Feature Engineering: Extract Group from PassengerId (gggg_pp format), split Cabin into Deck/Num/Side, create TotalExpenditure from RoomService+FoodCourt+ShoppingMall+Spa+VRDeck, use TF-IDF on Name features
Models: Ensemble of XGBoost, LightGBM, CatBoost with Optuna-optimized weights. Use StratifiedKFold cross-validation. Multiple random seeds for robustness.
Advanced techniques: KMeans clustering on features, Group-clustered one-hot encoding, multiplicative features, TF-IDF + PCA on text, optimal cutoff threshold selection
